articles.title: South Korea s Han Kang wins 2024 Nobel literature prize
articles.description: South Korean author Han Kang won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Literature for “her intense poetic prose that confronts historical traumas and exposes the fragility of human life,” the award-giving body said on Thursday. MORE..

articles.title: More than 3 million without power as Hurricane Milton slams Florida, causes deaths and flooding
articles.description: Hurricane Milton churned across Florida on Thursday after plowing into the state as a Category 3 storm, bringing misery to a coast still ravaged by Helene, pounding cities with winds of over 100 mph (160 kph) after producing a barrage of tornadoes, but sparing Tampa a direct hit. MORE..

articles.title: Postal Department clarifies issuance of stamps featuring PM and Minister
articles.description: The Department of Posts has issued a clarification regarding the recent release of stamps featuring Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya and Minister Vijitha Herath. MORE..

articles.title: Passenger bus gutted in fire at Madampe
articles.description: A private bus en route to Embilipitiya from Colombo was completely destroyed after catching fire in the Kawduwawa area of Madampe earlier today (10). MORE..

articles.title: Showery conditions to enhance in south-western part of the island
articles.description: The Department of Meteorology says showery condition is expected to enhance to some extent in the south-western part of the Island in the next few days starting from today (10), due to the development of atmospheric disturbance in the vicinity of Sri Lanka. MORE..

articles.title: Ratan Tata, former Tata Group chairman, dies at age 86
articles.description: Ratan Tata, the former Tata Group chairman who put a staid and sprawling Indian conglomerate on the global stage with a string of high-profile acquisitions, has died, the Tata Group said in a statement late on Wednesday. He was 86. MORE..
